name: Airdropping
description: Airdropping, handles airdropping interactions and provides airdropping position details. Gives airdropping info and handles airdropping interactions.

functionDecorators.name: addAirdroppingPoints
functionDecorators.description: Adds airdropping points to an address, internal only.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of points to be added.

functionDecorators.name: blacklist
functionDecorators.description: Gets all addresses are blacklisted from receiving airdropping rewards.

returnDecorators.name: blacklist_
returnDecorators.description: All addresses that are blacklisted from receiving airdropping rewards.

functionDecorators.name: blacklistCut
functionDecorators.description: Add/remove any number of addresses who are blacklisted from receiving airdropping rewards.

functionDecorators.name: cropDust
functionDecorators.description: Transfers a constant amount of Tangle set by owner to each address in a list of addresses.
